description: We all know that Thanksgiving is best known for turkey, stuffing, and pumpkin pie. But what about the best cocktails? Sure there are many different options to choose from but none of them compares to this Chocolate Pecan Cream Martini! It combines&nbsp;sweet chocolate with a lovely nutty flavor that will make you want more than just one.
keywords: Chocolate Pecan Cream Martini Cocktail Recipe
How To Chocolate Pecan Cream Martini
name: Chocolate Pecan Cream Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake well until combined
recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake well until combined

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into glasses either straight up or over ice cubes, whichever you prefer best!
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into glasses either straight up or over ice cubes, whichever you prefer best!
